column5: Hi all,  Well i got a nice 30" pike yesterday, but due to not reading the rules to the tourney properly it aint gonna be allowed...my bad.  After getting a bit of flak from SNAG...lol...who apparently suffers from "Taranna Pike Envy" (good one GCD!) i found yself reminiscing about larger pike i've had, trying to convince myself that i would get a better one than 30" for team # 3 anyway.  I did not realise i had so many videos of large pike i've caught, then realised that most of them were taken last May at the bottom of our yard right after ice out....and i put this little compilation together........still another two and a half months of ice fishing to go....but man...cant wait for some more of this...save so much on gas and its right on the doorstep....dont get much better than that! And with the baby due any moment now...i am gonna be spending a lot of time close to home anyway....lol.   The video is pretty long...sorry 'bout that...     ICE OUT PIKE CHEZ LIMEYANGLER  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/iceout.flv">
Uh-oh!... Snagglepuss isn't going to like this!!!  Good on you for posting it Simon!!!
OMG!!! you're Preggers???... I didn't even know you were MARRIED!!!
Some nice looking Toothy Brutes, i cant wait till spring, thanks for posting the video up Limey.
just realised its only the 2 minute version...have the 8 minute version uploading on youtube now.
very cool, that one pike was a fatty!!!!  cheers!
Great video, it must be amazing to have a great lake like that right outside your door.
I sure wish ice-out pike were in-season where i live or cottage.
not long enough Simon! thats some great lookin action ya got goin in the back yard! know you have me anticipating some big spring pike!

right on, gotta love that right in your back yard.  I love spring pike fishin, I do lots of foishing off my dock at camp with a slip float and big chubs for pike it's alot of fun, you got some real pigs there  what happened to your tourney entry???

I won't be baited into this immature conversation.   um,    Well, anyways, since I'm here......  It's Toronto......TORONTO.   Why would I have pike envy?  MINES BIGGER    Love the video. I have to try the float thing one day.  The man with the funny voice is funny.  Congrats on not sleeping very soon!!!!
Were you using live or dead bait?  Only thing I get deadbaiting smelts are hammer handles & whistletrout.

Good video Simon  I'd be statified with ice out in NWO in approx 86 days, watch the ice melt like I did last year and then have an extremely good week of piking.  Thanks for sharing and good luck with the little one

Livebaiting big dace and sucker minnows...5-7" ...mostly on my slip bobber set up in 2-7' FOW         I know....gonna be soooo much fun ......          I dont think it will be allowed JWL....but worth a shot....lol
